title: S4 E1 - The Pact
desc: Our season kicks off in Mumbai with Siddhi finally getting hitched. Amidst the cacophony of the celebrations, the girls find a quiet moment to make a pact with each other.

title: S4 E2 - Pact Ke Side Effects
desc: The girls are finally living their pacts. Damini channels defiance into creativity, Anjana flirts with romance, and Siddhi faces the realities of adult married life.

title: S4 E3 - Unapologetically Me
desc: Umang's date ends badly, Damini's podcast stirs drama with her ex Warsi, and Siddhi's comedy success strains her marriage.

title: S4 E4 - Growing Pains
desc: Siddhi's first brand reel turns viral, sparking tension. Damini juggles podcast chaos and fertility fears. When Damini discovers Umang's secret link, emotions flare.

title: S4 E5 - Better Than Sex
desc: The Bangkok arc kicks off. Anjana finds maturity, Siddhi owns her sensuality, and Damini faces unresolved emotions around Jeh.

title: S4 E6 - Handle With Care
desc: Siddhi's bold stand-up strains her marriage. Anjana faces comic chaos at salsa class. Damini lands a big interview through Jeh.

title: S4 E7 - Lost & Found
desc: In Goa, the girls face love and closure. Anjana surfs, Damini reunites with Jeh, and at Pride, Umang publicly confesses her feelings for Shai.
